meta.title: Sidebar
meta.description: The `<b-sidebar>` component creates a fixed viewport, left or right, sliding popout drawer.

props.description: Text content to place in the default header. The `title` slot takes precedence
When `true`, positions the sidebar on the right of the viewport
When `true`, opens the sidebar. This is the `v-model`
Theme variant color for the background of the sidebar
Theme variant color for the text of the sidebar
When set, disables the default sliding animation
Set to boolean `true` for medium shadow, 'sm' for small shadow, 'lg' for large shadow, or boolean `false` for no shadow. Default is no shadow
CSS width for the sidebar. Defaults to '320px' as defined by SCSS/CSS
Specify an arbitrary z-index value to override the value defined by SCSS/CSS
`aria-label` to apply to the built-in close button. Defaults to 'Close'
Class, or classes, to apply to the built in header. Has no effect if prop `no-header` is set
Class, or classes, to apply to the body (default slot) of the sidebar
Class, or classes, to apply to the optional `footer` slot
When set to `true`, the content of the sidebar will only be rendered while the sidebar is open
When set to `true` disables rendering of the default header (including close button)
When set to `true` disables rendering of the header close button
When set to `true`, disables closing the sidebar when the user presses ESC
When set to `true`, disables closing of the sidebar on route change

events.description: Emitted whenever the visibility of the sidebar changes. Used to update the `v-model`

args.description: `true` if the sidebar is open, `false` if it is closed (or in the process of closing)

events.description: Emitted when the sidebar has opened
Emitted when the sidebar has been hidden

slots.name: title
slots.description: Content to place in the title of the built-in header. Takes precedence over the `title` prop

scope.description: When called, will close the sidebar
`true` if the sidebar is on the right

slots.name: header-close
slots.description: Content of the header close button. Defaults to `<b-icon-x>`

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content to place in the body of the sidebar

scope.description: When called, will close the sidebar
`true` if the sidebar is on the right

slots.name: footer
slots.description: Content to place in the optional footer

scope.description: When called, will close the sidebar
`true` if the sidebar is on the right
